Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.view.CLI

Class CliView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.view.CLI.CliView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class CliView extends Object implements ViewInterface
Classes that manages the client over command line interface

    • CliView

      public CliView(String ip, int port, String connectionType)
      Constructs a CLI view for interacting with a server over a specified IP address and port.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the server.
      port - The port number of the server.
      connectionType - The type of connection to establish with the server.

      tableCard3 - The third table card on display.
      tableCard4 - The fourth table card on display.

    • notifyCurrentPlayer

      public void notifyCurrentPlayer(String current, Map<String,PlayableCard[][]> boards, String player, ArrayList<ResourceCard> hand, State gamestate)
      Notifies about the current player's turn and updates their board and hand if applicable. Prints a message with the current player's name. If the game state is State.PLAYING and it's the current player's turn, updates and displays their board and hand.
      Specified by:
      notifyCurrentPlayer in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      current - The name of the current player.
      boards - A map containing the game boards of all players.
      player - The name of the player whose board and hand should be updated.
      hand - The current hand of cards of the player.
      gamestate - The current state of the game.

    • notifyChangePlayerBoard

      public void notifyChangePlayerBoard(String player, String nickname, Map<String,PlayableCard[][]> boards)
      Notifies when a player has made a change to their game board and displays the updated board. If the player's board is updated, prints a success message for the current player ("You") and displays their board. Otherwise, prints a notification message for other players about the card placement and displays the player's board.
      Specified by:
      notifyChangePlayerBoard in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      player - The player who made the change to their board.
      nickname - The nickname of the current player.
      boards - A map containing the game boards of all players.

    • ReceiveUpdateOnPoints

      public void ReceiveUpdateOnPoints(String player, int points)
      Notifies when a player's points have been updated. Prints a message indicating the player's updated points.
      Specified by:
      ReceiveUpdateOnPoints in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      player - The name of the player whose points were updated.
      points - The new points value for the player.

    • NotifyChangePersonalCards

      public void NotifyChangePersonalCards(ArrayList<ResourceCard> p)
      Notifies the player about their updated hand of resource cards. Displays the details of the player's updated hand using the drawHand method.
      Specified by:
      NotifyChangePersonalCards in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      p - The updated list of resource cards in the player's hand.

    • notifyChoiceObjective

      public void notifyChoiceObjective(ObjectiveCard o)

      Specified by:
      notifyChoiceObjective in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      o - The personal objective card chosen by the player.

    • notifyFirstHand

      public void notifyFirstHand(ArrayList<ResourceCard> hand, StartingCard startingCard, ObjectiveCard o1, ObjectiveCard o2)
      Notifies the player about their initial game setup including hand, starting card, and personal objectives. Displays the details of the player's hand, starting card, and two personal objectives using drawHand, drawStarting, and drawObjective methods.
      Specified by:
      notifyFirstHand in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      hand - The initial hand of resource cards for the player.
      startingCard - The starting card that the player needs to choose a side for.
      o1 - The first personal objective card for the player to choose from.
      o2 - The second personal objective card for the player to choose from.

    • notifyCommonObjective

      public void notifyCommonObjective(ObjectiveCard objectiveCard1, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard2)
      Notifies players about the common objectives and their associated points. Displays the details of two common objectives using the drawObjective method.
      Specified by:
      notifyCommonObjective in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      objectiveCard1 - The first common objective card.
      objectiveCard2 - The second common objective card.

    • updateCommonTable

      public void updateCommonTable(Map<String,Integer> points, ResourceCard topResDeck, ResourceCard topGoldDeck, ResourceCard tableCard1, ResourceCard tableCard2, ResourceCard tableCard3, ResourceCard tableCard4)
      Updates the common game table with points and resource cards, and displays the updated table.
      Specified by:
      updateCommonTable in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      points - A Map containing player names as keys and their points as values.
      topResDeck - The top resource card from the resource deck.
      topGoldDeck - The top gold card from the gold deck.
      tableCard1 - The first card on the common table.
      tableCard2 - The second card on the common table.
      tableCard3 - The third card on the common table.
      tableCard4 - The fourth card on the common table.

    • NotifyNumbersOfPlayersReached

      public void NotifyNumbersOfPlayersReached()
      Notifies that the required number of players has been reached and the game will start soon. This method prints a message to the console indicating that there are enough players to start the game.
      Specified by:
      NotifyNumbersOfPlayersReached in interface ViewInterface

    • NotifyLastRound

      public void NotifyLastRound()
      Notifies players that the last round is starting, during which drawing won't be allowed. This method prints a message to the console indicating the start of the last round.
      Specified by:
      NotifyLastRound in interface ViewInterface

    • UpdateCrashedPlayer

      public void UpdateCrashedPlayer(String nickname, String player, State gameState, ArrayList<ResourceCard> hand, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard, Map<String,PlayableCard[][]> boards, Map<String,Integer> points, ArrayList<String> players, ArrayList<ObjectiveCard> objectiveCards, Color color, ArrayList<ResourceCard> table)
      Updates the game state after a player has crashed or disconnected.
      Specified by:
      UpdateCrashedPlayer in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player who crashed or disconnected.
      player - The replacement player's nickname or identifier.
      gameState - The current state of the game after the crash.
      hand - The hand of cards belonging to the replacement player.
      objectiveCard - The objective card assigned to the replacement player.
      boards - The game boards of all players, including the replacement player's board.
      points - A Map containing updated points for all players, including the replacement player.
      players - A list of all active players in the game.
      objectiveCards - A list of all available objective cards in the game.
      color - The color associated with the replacement player.
      table - The current state of the common resources table.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      points - A Map containing player names as keys and their updated points as values.
      commons - An ArrayList of ResourceCard objects representing the common resources.
